review: I have used this fire tv every day since I purchased it on April 2, 2014 and have enjoyed using out every minute until today. After the OS update to include the photos, prime music and the other features the box will not load content, my recent list and can't give me any movies because it can't reach servers. I have unplugged it and reset it over 12 times today. What good is an update if it ruins the great experience I was having with this product before? I guess I will dust off my Sony blu Ray player and resubscribe to Netflix. I have bought five tv sticks for my daughter's also for their prime accounts and now I feel like an idiot for giving them something that has gone downhill so badly. Amazon next time try beta testing a little longer before you ruin a great product. Huge fail!

review: So far so good - We are just getting used to not having cable, DISH or DirectTV in the house after 18 years. Going total free HDTV, Netflix, Vudu and this. So far our tv bill is only $30 and then of course internet is $55. Way better than $200 a month! We will see if we can keep going with it!
